sample.title: Willpower
sample.content:
{An Invocation test is a Full Action. For the duration of the Round, the character clears his mind of external influence and focuses his will more intently. This may be through recitation of mantras, use of psychic foci, or meditation. A successful test indicates that the character's mind is ready to channel a greater amount of the warp than usual, while still limiting his exposure. On the next Round, the character adds +1 to the final Psy Rating of any Fettered Power Test  Failure on the Invocation Test indicates that the character's attempts to focus have backfired, and he must take a —I penalty tothe final Psy Rating ofa Fettered Power Test. If this reduces the Psy Rating to zero, the power fails to activate.
Skill Use: Full Action
